mapper.select: SELECT p.*, first_name as n_first_name, family_name as n_family_name, money as m_value, reputation as r_value, battle as b_value, knowledge as k_value, support as s_value, max_energy as e_max, energy as e_value FROM person p LEFT JOIN applicant a on p.id = a.person_id WHERE world_id = #{worldId} AND a.person_id IS NULL

SELECT p.*, first_name as n_first_name, family_name as n_family_name, money as m_value, reputation as r_value, battle as b_value, knowledge as k_value, support as s_value, max_energy as e_max, energy as e_value FROM person p LEFT JOIN applicant a on p.id = a.person_id WHERE world_id = #{worldId} AND a.person_id IS NOT NULL
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO person (world_id, first_name, family_name, money, reputation, battle, knowledge, support, max_energy, energy) VALUES (#{worldId}, #{person.name.firstName}, #{person.name.familyName}, #{person.money.value}, #{person.reputation.value}, #{person.battle.value}, #{person.knowledge.value}, #{person.support.value}, #{person.energy.max}, #{person.energy.value})
